column2: We will §Yimmediately§! declare war on the Byzantines to make them our Tributary
The lost territory of the Roman Empire must be reclaimed! §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to seize all titles held by §Y$TARGET$§! within the de jure §Y$TITLE$§!.
column3: Le territoire perdu par l'Empire romain doit être reconquis ! §Y$CLAIMANT$§! peut utiliser ce casus belli pour s'emparer de tous les tires détenus par §Y$TARGET$§! qui appartiennent de jure à §Y$TITLE$§!.
column4: Die verlorenen Territorien des Römischen Reiches müssen zurückgewonnen werden! §Y$CLAIMANT$§! kann diesen Kriegsgrund nutzen, um alle Titel von §Y$TARGET$§! innerhalb von §Y$TITLE$§! zu konfiszieren.
column6: ¡Los territorios perdidos del Imperio Romano han de ser recuperados! §Y$CLAIMANT$§! puede usar este Casus Belli para recuperar todos los títulos de §Y$TARGET$§! que se encuentren en el territorio de Jure de §Y$TITLE$§!.

column2: It is time to try and unify these domains to our realm to finally unify India
It is time to try and unify these domains to our realm to finally unify India
It is time to take bake lands that were once lost during unstable times. The Imperial borders shall be restored!
By enforcing the Danegeld we get payed what we would normally have to raid for, saving us many precious warriors.

Now that we have a foot hold in Spain, we will conquer all of Iberia just like Tariq ibn Ziyad durring the reign of our great grandfathers durring the Islamic Golden Age. We shall unite Isbaniya under one banner

An end shall finally be brought to the heretical empire of the Germans! They claim to Holy and Roman while they lack both qualities. We shall liberate them from their idiotic Kaiser and bring forth our own true Holy nature to the seamingly barbaric peoples of Germania.

These lands are rich and we should make it's Ruler pay us a small tribute while we plunder the capital

The Ruler of these lands hold great treasures in perhaps a secure place, its time to plunder this secured area to perhaps plunder one of these artifacts. We may not know what we find, but whatever our target will be this time. It surely has something good

Our respect and the respect towards our God has been very low these days. We have to regain our honor and our piety towards that which we worship. We will let everyone know about our victory once we win.

The ruler of [Title.GetBaseName] have refused our offer for them to embrace Islam. As the Caliph of Islam, i cannot let these heretics get away with their belives while they enjoy their riches and power. It is time we conquer these lands to secure the power of the Caliphate and to try spreading the word of Islam to hopefull gain more followers, those that wont convert are free to belive what they want.

The Rashudins are starting to become more and more corrupt, it is time we stop this at once and assert our dominance in the name of the Umayyad Dynasty

The Umayyads are starting to become more and more corrupt while favoring their own people over anyone else, This is against Islam while disgracefull them to call themself a Caliphate. it is time we end the Umayyad dynasty at once and install the Abbasid Dynasty as the new rulers of the Caliphate
